issue.title: [Docs][C++] Add missing methods to ArrayBuilders API Reference
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17343](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17343). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the very least, `StructBuilder` doesn't show it's `num_fields()` and `field_builder()` methods.
